entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
